title: Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 10.1 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Slate Black)

product_specification.Additional Features: 4 Modes (Stand Mode, Hold Mode, Tilt Mode, Hang Mode), AnyPen Technology
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, USB Cable, Warranty Card, User Guide, Power Adaptor
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus, 180 Degree Rotating Camera, Gesture Controlled Camera
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.A Tablet That Adapts to Your Needs: Hold, tilt, stand or hang - the battery cylinder and kickstand on the side lets you use the tablet in multiple ways.
product_description.Feel the Beat: The two integrated front-facing speakers and the Dolby Atmos technology make for an immersive aural experience, even without headphones.
product_description.Vibrant Display: Whether you're watching videos, gaming or browsing the Internet, every visual will be crisp and clear on the 25.6 cm (10) HD display.
product_description.Rotatable Camera: Take beautiful photos or chat on Skype with the pin-sharp 8 MP 180° rotatable camera. Simply strike a pose and open-close your hand to click photos with gestures.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery Life: The 8400 mAh battery offers up to 18 hours of intense usage. The USB 'On the Go' powerbank feature lets you charge other devices from the tablet.

review:
Product :Worth this price for 10.1 inch screen size. Good Screen resolution. Good for reading magazines, articles & of course for entertainment purposes. Can not say much now.

For Flipkart : Amazed by Flipkart service. I got the product delivered exactly in 15 hrs. Very prompt follow up by deliver person and smoothly delivered.

"How I Stopped Worrying and Learned to Love Lenovo Yoga Tab 3."

Look, it's a decent product and it gets the job done.
YouTube App won't play 1080p videos since it has a resolution of 1280x720.
Same story goes with a full HD movie.
Battery is great.
Speakers are decent.
Camera is okay-ish.
Hotspot acts erratically, good luck connecting other devices in first attempt.
No calling facility.
If I were you, I'd go for Lenovo Tab 4. I couldn't because they don't accept returns. Which led to quite a tiresome conversation. It was like banging my head against a wall. And after an hour of banging I kinda felt dizzy. So this is How I Stopped Worrying and Learned to Love Lenovo Yoga Tab 3.
Keep in mind, THIS PRODUCT HAS A 10 DAYS REPLACEMENT POLICY, NOT RETURN POLICY. Lenovo Tab 4 would cost you ₹7000 more but at least, it won't be losing its relevancy anytime soon.
It'd have been perfect if it came along with 1080p display and 3GB RAM.
This tablet is on the verge of becoming a dinosaur. Which one? I don't know. Let's just say T-Rex. Remember those fellas with tiny arms? Yeah! At least they were faster than this tablet.
Nevertheless, stand feature is great.
It's heavy, so it's not for people with flimsy hands. You're very likely to get tired easily while holding it in one hand.
All in all, don't throw much at it and it'll just get by.
P.S. If you want to make calls with this tablet, just download Jio4GVoice App. If Play Store says that the App isn't compatible with your device, then simply download it in your phone and send it do your tablet via SHAREit/Xender etc. Install it manually and enjoy calling features. Use same procedure with MyJio App for Data Consumption Monitoring and to avail other features.

Using from last 5 months. I must say it is perfect for me. My main purpose is to use for study purposes. I use pencil for notes making and most importantly underlined, highlights.
It is having super super awesome battery full day runs with wifi on.
Must go if you looking for study purposes.

Yoga 3 won't support WhatsApp, banking apps and few other apps. Ordered this with much expectations but disappointed and earlier I was using yoga 2 was good actually it was supporting all apps.
Flipkart service is good and device is fine...

It doesn't have a call facility. Well sim can be used for data usage which is good and of course better than wifi tablet. Seller is giving wrong information to customers saying call facility is available

Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 is good at its price and is worthy basically for its 10.1 inch size and speakers... If u want to watch movies or you want to do youtubing, read articles, magazines, want to try some tutorials then its awesome and that kind of stuff then its the best tab in this range. I am very impressed with the speakers and touch of tab.

Graphics are fine, internal memory is 16GB and it has 2 GB RAM, Android is Marshmallow (6.0.1) and one more thing, it does not support WhatsApp or bank app, some apps like ALT Balaji, Episode, etc. I tried but failed.

All the modes of this Yoga Tab are helpful. You want to study, you want to play they just help. There is no call facility in this tablet. It is just a tab which can be connected to internet via wifi or 4g-3g internet packs. Battery life is good. Charger cable is very very small. you cannot use tab while charging. Camera is also not that good. but its fine for this price 10 inch tab. There is no headphones in the box. I was expecting headphones but didn't get one.

Just put a screen guard and add a memory card to use it for long purpose. There will be difficulty in finding a screen guard and case/cover for this tablet. I am facing in finding a case/cover.

Delivery was one day prior. Packing was not that good. They just packed it. It was not bubble wrapped or any other safety precaution was not taken by Flipkart to protect device. At lest they should have bubble wrapped it.

The YT3-X50L is a great product - good resolution, clean UI and the usual stuff you would expect from Lenovo build and Android OS.

The problem is that this has no meaningful support for multi-users. Marshmallow 6.0 on my Lenovo Vibe smartphone works fine. But on this tablet, (which auto-upgraded to 6.0.1 when I set it up) has unusable multi-user support.

You have to go to Settings and search for "User" - there's no menu item directly available. Once you have setup a new user/restricted profile you cannot select this user in the login screen - there's no user icon in the top-right corner of the screen. So in effect, to switch users, you have to get past the lock screen, go to Settings, search for user and choose the user you wish to switch to.

Very clunky user experience.

Contacted Lenovo support, but I might as well have asked a politician when he is going to fulfil his election promise. Got motherhood suggestions and when I asked specific questions, was asked to go to Lenovo Care Center. Which I am unable to find from their website in my vicinity.
Product is very nice with amazing packing, reached two days before, 2GB RAM,16 GB ROM. Gud size. Best buy for medium prize laptop for study purpose
Totally worth it Cos of the 2GB of RAM. Bought this for my wife for reading, browsing n entertainment. Perfect fit for the requirement. Excellent to read magazines.

I m using this Tab from an year and it still works new
battery - lasts for more than a Day if u use continuously and if u use normally like PDFs or Whatsapp it lasts for 5-6 days easily

sound - Amazing JBL did great job
Display - Excellent
Handling - 4 ways pretty good and useful
touch - Not Even a problem occurred

cons - it doesn't have Notification light
that's all only one
just go for it if u want to watch movies ,YT,PDFs ,Whatsapp

Games of High GB can't be played

ROM is good. Version is old. Look wise awesome product. You can use it without holding in hand because stand is in built given which is best part.
